amendment.description: At the end of division F (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XX. For "Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration--Mental Health' for establishing ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 178 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide $5 million for the creation and operation of a National Mental Health and Substance Use Policy Laboratory.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Murphy (PA) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A151) offered by Mr. Murphy (PA).
